summary: The Bolstering Research And Innovation Now Act (BRAIN Act) aims to advance research and treatment for brain tumors. It focuses on improving awareness, access, and adequacy of specialized cancer and brain tumor care. Key provisions include establishing a Glioblastoma Therapeutics Network, promoting brain tumor-related cellular immunotherapy, launching a national public awareness campaign for cancer clinical trials and biomarker testing, and creating pilot programs to monitor and care for brain tumor survivors. It also mandates FDA guidance to ensure patient access to clinical trials and improve transparency of biospecimen collections.
